quoteFirst: “Vinolia, it appears,” he continued, “is being kept very dark, but the owner’s made an arrangement, so far as I could gather, for it to win the race it’s running in next week, and no one except those that are in the stable—  Why, bless my soul, if this isn’t the rummiest coincidence I ever come across in all my born days.  I’m talking to you about Vinolia, and here my eye lights on the very name.
